definition: Jia Sixie, sixth century writer and author of agricultural encyclopedia Essential skill to benefit the people 齊民要術|齐民要术[Qi2 min2 Yao4 shu4]

sentences.english: Jia Sixie is well-known as a pioneer in farming.
sentences.chinese: 賈思勰是一位有名的農學先驅。

sentences.english: Some people thought Jia Sixie was a lucky man.
sentences.chinese: 有些人認爲賈思勰是一個幸運的人。

sentences.english: Jia Sixie lived in the sixth century AD.
sentences.chinese: 賈思勰餬口在公元六世紀強大。

sentences.english: Jia Sixie did experiments and showed that his way was better.
sentences.chinese: 賈思勰作了試驗，證明他的方法較好。

sentences.english: Jia Sixie is known as one of the pioneers of farming.
sentences.chinese: 賈思勰被認爲是農學的先驅者之一。

sentences.english: Jia Sixie's book is a practical guide to farming.
sentences.chinese: 賈思勰的書是耕作的實用指南。

sentences.english: However, Jia Sixie did experiments and showed that his way was better.
sentences.chinese: 不過，賈思勰做了試驗，證明他的方法比較好。
